Uses of Class
org.springframework.web.service.invoker.HttpRequestValues.Builder

Packages that use HttpRequestValues.Builder
Package
Description
org.springframework.web.service.invoker
Support for creating a client proxy for an HTTP service annotated with HttpExchange methods.
